sections.content:
Ok I guess I'm not actually terrified of horses. I think I more, like, revere them? I think they are scary, but I think it's just that they are really huge. Like just absolutely massive and muscley? But they seem sweet, maybe. I've not been around them much, which is on purpose. And I think I will continue to keep it that way.

Anyway, this is just a goofy little post. Enjoy, void.
